an9.26:1.2: Ekam samayam ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca candikaputto rajagahe viharanti veluvane kalandakanivape.
an9.26:1.3: Tatra kho ayasma candikaputto bhikkhu amantesi (…):
an9.26:1.5: ‘yato kho, avuso, bhikkhuno cetasa citam hoti, tassetam bhikkhuno kallam veyyakaranaya—
an9.26:1.6: khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’”ti.
an9.26:2.1: Evam vutte, ayasma sariputto ayasmantam candikaputtam etadavoca:
an9.26:2.2: “na kho, avuso candikaputta, devadatto bhikkhunam evam dhammam deseti:
an9.26:2.3: ‘yato kho, avuso, bhikkhuno cetasa citam hoti, tassetam bhikkhuno kallam veyyakaranaya—
an9.26:2.4: khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’ti.
an9.26:2.5: Evanca kho, avuso, candikaputta, devadatto bhikkhunam dhammam deseti:
an9.26:2.6: ‘yato kho, avuso, bhikkhuno cetasa cittam suparicitam hoti, tassetam bhikkhuno kallam veyyakaranaya—
an9.26:2.7: khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’”ti.

an9.26:3.3: ‘yato kho, avuso, bhikkhuno cetasa citam hoti, tassetam bhikkhuno kallam veyyakaranaya—
an9.26:3.4: khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’”ti.

an9.26:4.6: “na kho, avuso candikaputta, devadatto bhikkhunam evam dhammam deseti:
an9.26:4.7: ‘yato kho, avuso, bhikkhuno cetasa citam hoti, tassetam bhikkhuno kallam veyyakaranaya—
an9.26:4.8: khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’ti.
an9.26:4.9: Evanca kho, avuso candikaputta, devadatto bhikkhunam dhammam deseti:
an9.26:4.10: ‘yato kho, avuso, bhikkhuno cetasa cittam suparicitam hoti, tassetam bhikkhuno kallam veyyakaranaya—
an9.26:4.11: khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattayati pajanami’ti.
an9.26:5.1: Kathanca, avuso, bhikkhuno cetasa cittam suparicitam hoti?
an9.26:5.2: ‘Vitaragam me cittan’ti cetasa cittam suparicitam hoti;
an9.26:5.3: ‘vitadosam me cittan’ti cetasa cittam suparicitam hoti;
an9.26:5.4: ‘vitamoham me cittan’ti cetasa cittam suparicitam hoti;
an9.26:5.5: ‘asaragadhammam me cittan’ti cetasa cittam suparicitam hoti;
an9.26:5.6: ‘asadosadhammam me cittan’ti cetasa cittam suparicitam hoti;
an9.26:5.7: ‘asamohadhammam me cittan’ti cetasa cittam suparicitam hoti;
an9.26:5.8: ‘anavattidhammam me cittam kamabhavaya’ti cetasa cittam suparicitam hoti;
an9.26:5.9: ‘anavattidhammam me cittam rupabhavaya’ti cetasa cittam suparicitam hoti;
an9.26:5.10: ‘anavattidhammam me cittam arupabhavaya’ti cetasa cittam suparicitam hoti.
an9.26:5.11: Evam samma vimuttacittassa kho, avuso, bhikkhuno bhusa cepi cakkhuvinneyya rupa cakkhussa apatham agacchanti, nevassa cittam pariyadiyanti;
an9.26:5.12: amissikatamevassa cittam hoti thitam anenjappattam, vayam cassanupassati.
an9.26:6.2: Tassassu attha kukku hettha nemangama, attha kukku upari nemassa.
an9.26:6.3: Atha puratthimaya cepi disaya agaccheyya bhusa vatavutthi, neva nam sankampeyya na sampavedheyya;
an9.26:6.6: atha dakkhinaya cepi disaya agaccheyya bhusa vatavutthi, neva nam sankampeyya na sampavedheyya.
an9.26:6.9: Evamevam kho, avuso, samma vimuttacittassa bhikkhuno bhusa cepi cakkhuvinneyya rupa cakkhussa apatham agacchanti, nevassa cittam pariyadiyanti;
an9.26:6.10: amissikatamevassa cittam hoti thitam anenjappattam, vayam cassanupassati.
an9.26:7.5: manovinneyya dhamma manassa apatham agacchanti, nevassa cittam pariyadiyanti;
an9.26:7.6: amissikatamevassa cittam hoti thitam anenjappattam, vayam cassanupassati”ti.
